models.certifications: Each certification represents a professional credential from a vendor like AWS, Azure, or (ISC)² that employees can pursue and track. Certifications include metadata about difficulty, exam requirements, and renewal cycles.
models.vendors: Vendors are the certification issuing bodies (AWS, Microsoft, (ISC)², etc.) that create and maintain certification programs.

relationships: Each Certification belongs to a Vendor (identified by vendorId and vendorName)
Certifications can have prerequisites that reference other Certifications by name
The holderCount field shows how many team members currently hold each certification

certifications.name: AWS Certified Solutions Architect - Associate
certifications.description: The AWS Certified Solutions Architect - Associate certification validates your ability to design distributed systems on AWS. This certification demonstrates your expertise in designing cost-optimized, fault-tolerant, and scalable systems using AWS services.

recommended: 6-12 months of hands-on experience with AWS
Understanding of core AWS services (EC2, S3, RDS, VPC)

options: Pass the current version of the exam
Pass a higher-level AWS certification exam
Complete 40 hours of AWS training and pass a recertification exam

certifications.name: AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner
certifications.description: AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner is an entry-level certification that validates overall understanding of the AWS Cloud. This certification is ideal for individuals in technical, managerial, sales, purchasing, or financial roles who work with the AWS Cloud.

recommended: Basic understanding of IT services and their uses in the AWS Cloud platform

options: Pass the current version of the Cloud Practitioner exam
Pass any AWS Associate or Professional level certification exam

certifications.name: AWS Certified DevOps Engineer - Professional
certifications.description: The AWS Certified DevOps Engineer - Professional certification validates technical expertise in provisioning, operating, and managing distributed application systems on the AWS platform. This certification demonstrates your ability to implement and manage continuous delivery systems and methodologies on AWS.

required: AWS Certified Developer - Associate OR AWS Certified SysOps Administrator - Associate
recommended: 2+ years of experience provisioning, operating, and managing AWS environments

options: Pass the current version of the DevOps Engineer Professional exam
Complete 80 hours of AWS training and pass a recertification exam

certifications.name: Microsoft Azure Administrator Associate
certifications.description: The Azure Administrator Associate certification validates your skills in implementing, managing, and monitoring an organization's Microsoft Azure environment. This includes managing cloud infrastructure services, applications, networks, and security.

recommended: 6+ months of hands-on experience with Azure administration
Understanding of core Azure services, workloads, security, and governance

examInfo.format: Multiple choice, case studies, and hands-on labs

options: Pass a free online renewal assessment on Microsoft Learn
Pass the current version of the AZ-104 exam

certifications.name: Microsoft Azure Solutions Architect Expert
certifications.description: The Azure Solutions Architect Expert certification validates expertise in designing cloud and hybrid solutions that run on Microsoft Azure. This certification demonstrates advanced skills in compute, network, storage, and security.

recommended: Advanced experience with Azure administration, development, and DevOps processes

examInfo.format: Multiple choice, case studies, and scenario-based questions

options: Pass a free online renewal assessment on Microsoft Learn
Pass the current version of the AZ-305 exam

certifications.name: Google Cloud Professional Cloud Architect
certifications.description: The Google Cloud Professional Cloud Architect certification demonstrates your ability to design, develop, and manage robust, secure, scalable, highly available, and dynamic solutions to drive business objectives using Google Cloud technologies.

recommended: 3+ years of industry experience including 1+ years designing and managing solutions using Google Cloud

options: Pass the current version of the Professional Cloud Architect exam

certifications.name: CISSP - Certified Information Systems Security Professional
certifications.description: CISSP is an internationally recognized certification in information security. It demonstrates an advanced level of knowledge in designing, implementing, and managing cybersecurity programs. CISSP covers eight domains of security knowledge.

required: 5 years of cumulative paid work experience in two or more of the eight domains of the CISSP CBK
recommended: Bachelor's degree or additional certification can substitute for 1 year of experience

options: Earn 120 CPE credits (40 per year) through professional development activities
Pay annual maintenance fees

certifications.name: CompTIA Security+
certifications.description: CompTIA Security+ is a global certification that validates the baseline skills necessary to perform core security functions and pursue an IT security career. It covers essential principles for network security and risk management.

recommended: CompTIA Network+ and 2 years of experience in IT administration with a security focus

options: Earn 50 Continuing Education Units (CEUs)
Retake the current version of the Security+ exam

certifications.name: CompTIA Network+
certifications.description: CompTIA Network+ validates the essential knowledge and skills needed to confidently design, configure, manage and troubleshoot wired and wireless networks. This certification covers networking concepts, infrastructure, operations, security, and troubleshooting.

recommended: CompTIA A+ certification and 9-12 months of networking experience

options: Earn 30 Continuing Education Units (CEUs)
Retake the current version of the Network+ exam

certifications.name: ITIL 4 Foundation
certifications.description: ITIL 4 Foundation introduces modern IT service management concepts and provides a practical and flexible approach to support organizations on their journey to digital transformation. It covers key concepts of service management and the ITIL 4 service value system.

recommended: Basic understanding of IT services and terminology

options: This is a lifetime certification with no renewal requirements

certifications.name: Certified Kubernetes Administrator (CKA)
certifications.description: The CKA certification demonstrates proficiency in managing Kubernetes clusters, including installation, configuration, management, and troubleshooting. This hands-on certification validates your ability to perform the responsibilities of Kubernetes administrators.

recommended: Experience with command-line interface and container technologies

options: Retake and pass the current version of the CKA exam

certifications.name: Certified Information Security Manager (CISM)
certifications.description: CISM certification indicates expertise in information security governance, risk management, incident management, and program development and management. CISM is designed for experienced security managers and those who have information security management responsibilities.

required: 5 years of work experience in information security management
recommended: A combination of experience in multiple CISM domains

options: Earn 120 Continuing Professional Education (CPE) hours (20 per year minimum)
Pay annual maintenance fees

certifications.name: Terraform Associate
certifications.description: The HashiCorp Certified: Terraform Associate certification validates your knowledge of basic concepts and skills in infrastructure automation using Terraform. This certification covers Terraform's purpose, workflow, and key features for infrastructure as code.

recommended: Basic understanding of cloud infrastructure and experience using Terraform in production

options: Retake and pass the current version of the Terraform Associate exam

certifications.name: Microsoft Azure Data Engineer Associate
certifications.description: The Azure Data Engineer Associate certification validates your ability to design and implement data management, monitoring, security, and privacy using Azure data services. This includes integrating, transforming, and consolidating data from structured and unstructured data systems.

recommended: Experience with data processing and data engineering concepts

options: Pass a free online renewal assessment on Microsoft Learn
Pass the current version of the DP-203 exam

certifications.name: Certified Ethical Hacker (CEH)
certifications.description: The Certified Ethical Hacker certification demonstrates knowledge of assessing the security of computer systems by looking for weaknesses and vulnerabilities using the same techniques as malicious hackers, but in a lawful and legitimate manner.

recommended: 2 years of work experience in information security OR attend official EC-Council training

examInfo.cost: $1,199 USD (includes training) or $950 USD (exam only with experience waiver)

options: Earn 120 ECE credits through various professional activities
Retake the current version of the CEH exam
